text: Singapore Zoo is a zoo in Singapore. It is ranked fourth worldwide, as recognized by TripAdvisor's 2017 Traveller's Choice awards. At Mandai Wildlife Reserve, the Singapore Zoo spans 26 hectares. They offer learning experiences to the visitors. Renowned for its naturalistic exhibits, the zoo provides many chances to marvel at wildlife, boasting over 4,200 animals from over 300 species, with 34 percent of them being classified as endangered. == References == Category:Singapore Category:Tourism Category:Parks in Singapore
title: Singapore Zoo
